title: Why can't I adjust the preset runes
body:
Hey there everyone,

Just curious if there's any way someone can go about adjusting the preset runes.  Also if not, why?  It's quite annoying to have to constantly change the runes before every match, especially if I play multiple roles?  I noticed you can purchase rune pages, but at a ridiculous BE price.

replies.body: Those presets are mainly there for people who are just getting into the new systems or don't have multiple pages bought yet. Buying multiple pages are mostly for convenience as I believe you start with at least 1/2 editable pages.
